MapInfo Advanced Level Course

22 October 2025 – 23 October 2025

CDR Group Online

The advanced course is designed to develop the user’s knowledge of MapInfo beyond the simple definition of the commands. The intention is to aid the student in using MapInfo to develop effective analysis and reporting techniques through hands-on use of the software. The course is aimed specifically at users who will be responsible for the management of a MapInfo installation, and those responsible for interpreting requirements for operations in order to develop applications. Find more information and register directly with CDR Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
